ref.mixed-citation:
Scholler AS
Fonnes M
Nazerai L
Local antigen encounter is essential for establishing persistent CD8(+) T-cell memory in the CNS. Front Immunol 2019; 10: 351. 30886617

note.p: This study illustrates that local antigen encounter in the CNS is critical for the development of memory CD8 T cells with a steady homeostasis through high expression levels of antiapoptotic Bcl-2 and proliferation marker Ki- 67.
